description: This file defines a React functional component named Sidebar, which provides a user interface for filtering notes by predefined categories and tags. It includes buttons for filter options ('All', 'Starred', 'Recent') and tag chips, handling user interactions to update filters and tags.

methods.name: Sidebar({ filter, setFilter, tags = [], setTag })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a sidebar with filter buttons and tag chips, allowing users to select filters and tags for notes.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ filter, setFilter, tags = [], setTag }){$/
